item.description:
UPDATE:

6pm NETWORKING TIME

6:30 -7:30 PRESENTATION

7:30-9 PM CELEBRATION - FOOD AND DRINK - TO CELEBRATE OUR MEETUP GETTING OUR 600th MEMBER. PLEASE JOIN US. PLEASE RSVP SO WE CAN ORDER ENOUGH FOOD!!!

Learn How to Make, Market and Publish YOUR Own Book!

According to USA Today, 82% of all Americans want to write a book!

Join Bruce Jones, author of 14 books, as he takes us through his process to research, develop, publish and market your book.  Bruce will demonstrate the processes and the systems needed to produce and successfully market your book.

Internet Marketing has turned the book publishing world on it's head.  Gone are the days of needing a traditional publishing partner - you can now do it yourself and more profitably at that!  Find out how the new online technologies allow for effective self-publishing.

Bruce will show you:

  • How to set up your platform
  • Do the research
  • Where to publish 
  • How market your book. 

We'll also do the usual networking and Q&A, plus we're working on a great food & refreshment plan thanks to our sponsors.

Stay tuned for updates ~ we're looking forward to another fun, informative session.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the conference room at the end of the building - look for the signs.
item.name: Make, Market and Publish YOUR Own Book
